title: Confluence Server Webwork OGNL Injection (CVE-2021-26084): How Akamai Helps You Protect Against Zero-Day Attacks
description: Recently Atlassian has disclosed a critical RCE (Remote Code Execution) vulnerability in its Confluence server and Data Center products (CVE-2021-26084), which might allow unauthenticated users to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable servers.
author: Assaf Vilmovsky , Abdeslam Bella & Maxim Zavodchik
